## {gtfsrealtime}

Fast library to read GTFS-realtime files into R data frames, using
compiled Rust code and [extendr](https://extendr.rs/)

# Package index

## All functions

- [`read_gtfsrt_positions()`](http://projects.indicatrix.org/gtfsrealtime-r/reference/read_gtfsrt_positions.md)
  : Read GTFS-realtime vehicle positions into a data frame
- [`read_gtfsrt_positions_internal()`](http://projects.indicatrix.org/gtfsrealtime-r/reference/read_gtfsrt_positions_internal.md)
  : Read GTFS-RT vehicle positions

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [Vehicle
  positions](http://projects.indicatrix.org/gtfsrealtime-r/articles/positions.md):
